column4: hey guys, i just installed ubu on a new sony vaio laptop...everything works great except for the SD card slot.  This slot works in winxp but when I put in a sd card while running ubu nothing happens.  How can i troubleshoot this?  I searched on the problem already.  Thanks!
i pmed you about my SD slot problem
its not listed here do lspci -vv
what am i looking for when i run that command?
CardBus bridge: Texas Instruments Unknown device 8039 this is the device
you having a sony vaio laptop
what model is it exactly o
wait for 5 minutes i will tell
it says your card will work automatically just put in the memory card in the card reader and a icon will come into the desktop
I dunno then, since Ive tried both of my sd cards and neither work
go through the above link i guess it will help you out
